Docs.summary: Defines the controller interface for to communicate with platform renderers.
Docs.remarks: This interface provides the communication channel between the cross-platform control and its platform-specific renderer. It is primarily used for internal implementation and is typically not used directly by application code.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the renderer needs to retrieve the current canvas size.
Docs.remarks: The renderer raises this event to get the canvas size from the control. Handlers should set the property with the current canvas size.
